mapper.sql: fid, fuid, ftradeid, fmaxprice, fminprice, fisopen, fupdatetime, version
mapper.insert: insert into f_user_priceclock (fid, fuid, ftradeid, fmaxprice, fminprice, fisopen, fupdatetime, version) values (#{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ftradeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fmaxprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fminprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fisopen,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update f_user_priceclock set fuid = #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ftradeid = #{ftradeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fmaxprice = #{fmaxprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fminprice = #{fminprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fisopen = #{fisopen,jdbcType=BIT}, fupdatetime = #{fupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = version + 1 where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and version = #{version}
